analysis.description: MDFToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/42/0xb53497a41bd4b667172dd3329cafa131805a2134.sol#145-152) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/42/0xb53497a41bd4b667172dd3329cafa131805a2134.sol:
	Contract MDFToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/42/0xb53497a41bd4b667172dd3329cafa131805a2134.sol#179-180)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
